mail.title: [Knowledge] Event notification {Date} {Start} #{KnowledgeId}: {KnowledgeTitle}
mail.description:
Send event notice to participants / users who stock events. The timing to transmit is as follows. - Sunday: Notice when it is held on that week (Sunday to Saturday) - Day of the meeting date: Notice when holding on that day - 30 minutes before the start time: Notify when 30 minutes have passed before the start time
[Reserved keywords] If you write the following keywords in the body, replace the value when sending mail.
- {URL} : URL of Target data - {KnowledgeId} : ID - {KnowledgeTitle} : Title - {UserName} : UserName - {Status} : Status（Participant/Wait Cancel/Stocked） - {Timing} : Timing（this week／today/soon） - {Date} : Date - {Start} : Start time - {End} : End time - {Place}: Place
